content.description: Grass clippings are placed in a bin, where they decompose. For 0 ≤ t ≤ 30 , the amount of grass clippings remaining in the bin is modeled by A(t) = 6.687(0.931)t , where A(t) is measured in pounds and t is measured in days.
content.question: Find the average rate of change of A(t) over the interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 30 . Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Find the average rate of change of A(t) over the interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 30 . Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
